title: Implement Process Management and Log Rotation
description: Implement comprehensive process management and log rotation for the Windsurf Task Master MCP server to address high CPU usage and excessive log file growth issues.

title: Process Manager Implementation
description: Implement a process manager script to monitor and manage Node.js processes related to the MCP server, identify zombie processes, clean up runaway processes, and handle duplicate processes.

title: Server Starter Implementation
description: Implement a server starter script to start the MCP server with proper process management, ensuring only one instance is running at a time, creating a PID file, and setting up proper signal handling for clean shutdown.

title: Maintenance Script Implementation
description: Implement a maintenance script to perform routine maintenance tasks including process cleanup, log rotation, and system health checks. Design it to be run as a cron job to regularly manage logs and processes.

title: Documentation and Testing
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the process management and log rotation scripts, including usage instructions and best practices. Test the scripts in various scenarios to ensure they work as expected.
